397a80995ae377decf17769c82e17b34ee2a4337.message: This tag is missing an 'integrity' subresource integrity attribute. Without this attribute, if an attacker can modify the externally hosted resource, this could lead to XSS and other types of attacks. To prevent this, include the base64-encoded cryptographic hash of the resource (file) you‚Äôre telling the browser to fetch in the 'integrity' attribute for all externally hosted files.

New Lead Submission

`,

`
